content:
That sounds like so much fun! Congratulations on joining a recreational league with your coworkers! I'd be happy to help you with some high-energy workout playlists to keep you motivated and pumped up during your games and other workouts.

Here are a few playlists that you might enjoy:

**Upbeat Pop/Rock Workout Playlist**

1. Eminem - "Lose Yourself"
2. Macklemore & Ryan Lewis - "Can't Hold Us"
3. The Black Eyed Peas - "I Gotta Feeling"
4. Kanye West - "Stronger"
5. Foo Fighters - "The Pretender"
6. Maroon 5 - "One More Night"
7. Imagine Dragons - "Radioactive"
8. The Script - "Hall of Fame" (feat. will.i.am)
9. Fall Out Boy - "Uma Thurman"
10. Green Day - "American Idiot"

**Electronic/Dance Workout Playlist**

1. Tiesto - "Red Lights"
2. Calvin Harris - "Summer"
3. The Chainsmokers - "Closer" (feat. Halsey)
4. David Guetta - "Titanium" (feat. Sia)
5. Major Lazer - "Lean On" (feat. DJ Snake & MØ)
6. Ariana Grande - "No Tears Left to Cry"
7. Justin Bieber - "Sorry"
8. Rihanna - "Work" (feat. Drake)
9. Kesha - "We R Who We R"
10. Bruno Mars - "Uptown Funk" (Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars)

**Hip-Hop/Rap Workout Playlist**

1. Cardi B - "Bodak Yellow"
2. Travis Scott - "Sicko Mode"
3. Post Malone - "Psycho" (feat. Ty Dolla Sign)
4. Nicki Minaj - "Chun-Li"
5. Lil Uzi Vert - "XO Tour Llama"
6. Drake - "God's Plan"
7. J. Cole - "Middle Child"
8. Logic - "1-800-273-8255" (feat. Alessia Cara & KAYTRANADA)
9. G-Eazy - "No Limit" (feat. Cardi B & A$AP Rocky)
10. 21 Savage - "Bank Account"

**Classic Rock/Indie Workout Playlist**

1. Queen - "We Will Rock You"
2. Guns N' Roses - "Sweet Child O' Mine"
3. AC/DC - "Thunderstruck"
4. The White Stripes - "Seven Nation Army"
5. Arctic Monkeys - "Do I Wanna Know?"
6. The Black Keys - "Lonely Boy"
7. Foo Fighters - "Everlong"
8. Red Hot Chili Peppers - "Give It Away"
9. Oasis - "Wonderwall"
10. Nirvana - "Smells Like Teen Spirit"

Feel free to mix and match songs from these playlists or add your own favorite tracks to create the perfect playlist for your workouts and volleyball games!
